subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: David Lee’s layup gave the Knicks a 100-99 lead with 9.7 seconds left. But Clifford Robinson’s putback of a Vince Carter miss with 2.8 seconds left gave the Nets a victory.
snippet: David Lee’s layup gave the Knicks a 100-99 lead with 9.7 seconds left. But Clifford Robinson’s putback of a Vince Carter miss with 2.8 seconds left gave the Nets a victory.
